project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to read a text file and count word frequencies
Sort and extract the top 10 most common words from the word frequency dictionary
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests to ensure the word counting and sorting functions work correctly
Execute tests on the implemented features to confirm accuracy
